overview:
Vanilla Breeze is a reputable mobile app and game developer based in Korea, funded by Korea Telecom and KTB Networks.

Vanilla Breeze has 4 years of multi-platform development experiences with 150+ iOS and Android apps & 38 million downloads (as of Q3 2012). They are known for their dedication to combine creative ideas with mobile technologies to deliver unique, fun, and engaging user experiences, and have been awarded consecutively during the 9th and the 10th Mobile Technology Award by Korea Communications Commission.

Vanilla Breeze’s two flagship titles are:

• i-Gun Ultimate Series: A genre-defining entertainment app series with more than 11 million downloads. Ranked US Top Paid Overall #22 in iTunes AppStore. Compatible with bluetooth enabled multiplayer iPad game i-Gun Shooter.

• Gelato Mania: An ice-cream decoration puzzle game with 2.5 million downloads. Ranked US #1 Puzzle Game during the first week of June, 2011.
